abstract: If Comcast succeeds in taking over NBC Universal, its struggling movie studio, Universal Studios, may become a laboratory for an owner that could reformulate the movie industry’s approach to its own customers.
snippet: If Comcast succeeds in taking over NBC Universal, its struggling movie studio, Universal Studios, may become a laboratory for an owner that could reformulate the movie industry’s approach to its own customers.
lead_paragraph: Not long ago, a first meeting between Hollywood executives and the potential new owners of their studio might have turned on Oscar prospects, this year’s ingénue or the exact dimensions of Russell Crowe’s salary.

headline.main: A Takeover Movie for Hollywood to Watch
